title: Customer Solutions Engineer (English, Portuguese)
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
description: gTech’s Professional Services team takes a creative, collaborative, and customer-centric approach to provide foundational services and forward-looking business solutions to top advertiser and publisher customers. Through technical implementation, optimization, and key solutions, gTech Professional Services helps customers attain their business goals while building long-term capabilities.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent practical experience. 3 years of experience coding with one or more programming languages (e.g., Java, C/C++, Python). 3 years of experience in web technologies (e.g., HTTP, HTML, XML), databases, SQL queries, and coding in Java, Python, or PHP. Experience in troubleshooting. Ability to communicate in English and Portuguese fluently to support client relationship management in this region.
preferred_qualifications: Experience in technical troubleshooting, and managing internal/external partners or customers. Experience with big data platforms and large volume data analytics. Experience in online advertising industry. Customer-facing experience in sales, sales engineering, consulting, or related function.
responsibilities: Provide technical consulting services and guidance around Google APIs and Cloud platforms to help clients develop cutting-edge applications across products. Work closely with customers to understand underlying business issues. Work across Sales, Support, and Product teams to provide innovative solutions to real-world issues. Propose, design, create and present prototypes, demos and proof-of-concepts to a wide variety of audiences, from engineers to marketing professionals. Leverage Google’s Cloud infrastructure and big data analytics systems to achieve goals. Cultivate relationships with the Sales team and customers, then leverage these relationships to identify and develop innovative technical solutions that lead to more advertising business.
